detail_desc: Trousers in sweatshirt fabric with an elasticated waist, side pockets and ribbed hems.
Off-the-shoulder jumper in a soft, fine knit containing some wool with a double-layered trim at the top, long, wide sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with sewn-in turn-ups on the sleeves.
Smocked top in woven fabric with a square neck, short butterfly sleeves and a small frill trim at the top and hem.
Knee-length 5-pocket shorts in stretch cotton twill with an adjustable elasticated waist and zip fly and button.
Sunglasses with plastic frames and tinted, UV-protective lenses.

5-pocket shorts in stretch denim with a regular waist, zip fly and button and slim legs with sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Made using Lycra® Freefit® technology for soft, super-generous stretch, maximum mobility and optimal comfort.
Boxy, rib-knit jumper with a turtle neck, dropped shoulders and long sleeves with contrasting colour stripes down the sides.
Oversized top in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton and silk blend with a slight sheen. Dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Chinos in washed cotton twill with a zip fly, side pockets and welt back pockets. Slim fit which is relaxed over the thighs and tapers from the knees down for a relaxed, well-tailored look.
5-pocket jeans in washed superstretch denim with hard-worn details, a regular waist, zip fly and slim legs.
5-pocket ankle-length jeans in washed denim with worn details, a high waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Calf-length dress in a knit containing some wool with a V-neck, gently dropped shoulders, ribbing at the cuffs and hem, and slits in the sides.
Shirt woven in a cotton blend with a collar, buttons down the front, a chest pocket, long sleeves with buttoned cuffs and a rounded hem.
Long, sleeveless dress in soft viscose jersey with a racer back, seam with concealed elastication at the waist, and a rounded hem. Longer at the back. Unlined.

Jacket in water-repellent functional fabric with a detachable, lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Flap front pockets with press-studs and elastication at the cuffs. Lined.
Straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with long sleeves and front pockets.
Trousers in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated drawstring waist.
Straight-cut top in jersey made from a cotton blend with beaded embroidery at the top and short sleeves.
Soft bra top in lace and mesh with short butterfly sleeves, an elasticated hem and single back fastener.

Sports jacket in soft pile with a high collar, zip down the front, side pockets, woven sections under the sleeves and down the sides, and a gently rounded hem. Ribbed cuffs and narrow ribbing around the collar and hem. Slightly longer at the back. Soft brushed inside.
Sleeveless top in jersey crêpe with a small, gathered stand-up collar, V-shaped opening at the front and rounded hem.
Round-necked T-shirt in patterned slub cotton jersey.
Short-sleeved polo shirt in soft jersey with a collar and button placket.

Joggers in soft sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend with contrasting colour panels in woven fabric. Casual style in a relaxed fit with an easy pull-on, elasticated, drawstring waist, and tapered legs with ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in a rib knit with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs, and a gently rounded hem.
Soft velour joggers in a relaxed fit. High waist with a wide, ribbed waistband and drawstring, and tapered legs with ribbing at the hems.
Top in lightweight sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Fitted V-neck top in sturdy, stretch microfibre with narrow shoulder straps. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Lace bra with underwired, moulded, lightly padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Wide, adjustable shoulder straps and three pairs of hook-and-eye fasteners at the back.
Short corduroy skirt with a regular waist and buttons at the top. Unlined.

Short-sleeved lace dress with a decorative bow on the front and cap sleeves. Zip at the back, narrow elastication at the waist and a gently flared skirt. Jersey-lined bodice and a sewn-in inner skirt.
Cropped top in soft sweatshirt fabric with long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline and cuffs.
Top in airy linen jersey with a V-neck, button placket and butterfly sleeves.
Long nightshirt in a cool, patterned viscose weave with rounded notch lapels, buttons down the front, long, cuffed sleeves and a gently rounded hem.

Sports bralette in ribbed, fast-drying functional fabric with narrow, adjustable shoulder straps. Light support. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.

Blouse in a patterned viscose weave with a round neck and opening with a button at the back of the neck. Smocked bodice, long, wide sleeves with narrow elastication at the cuffs and a peplum at the hem. Unlined.

Sports trousers in heavy jersey with taped details. Elasticated, drawstring waist, zipped side pockets and tapered legs with shaping seams at the knees for added mobility and wide ribbing at the hems. The polyester content of the trousers is recycled.
All-in-one suit in soft, patterned sweatshirt fabric with a jersey-lined hood, zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets, and ribbing at the cuffs and hems. Soft brushed inside.
Scarf in patterned silk that can also be worn as a hairband. Size 55x55 cm.
3/4-length leggings in soft, organic cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Sleeveless sports top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a cut-out section and tie detail at the back.
Sandals in woven fabric with foot and ankle straps that have a hook and loop fastening. Moulded soles.
Yoga tights in fast-drying functional fabric with wide ribbing to hold in and shape the waist. Mesh key pocket in the waistband.
Jumper knitted in a soft mohair blend with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short-sleeved top in soft jersey with a motif and a rounded hem. Longer at the back.
Pyjamas with a short top and bottoms in lightweight, ribbed jersey. Top with a round neckline and long sleeves. Bottoms with an elasticated, drawstring waist and straight legs.

Rain jacket in patterned wind- and waterproof functional fabric with closed seams and a detachable hood with an elasticated front edge. Zip and wind flap with press-studs down the front, flap side pockets with a press-stud, and elasticated cuffs. Unlined. The jacket has a water-repellent coating without fluorocarbons.
Long-sleeved shirt in soft washed cotton twill with a small embroidered detail on the chest, buttoned cuffs and a contrasting colour on the inside of the collar stand and cuffs.
Short shorts in a viscose crêpe weave with an elasticated drawstring waist and decorative lace trims at the front and hems.

Short dress in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and a yoke at the back. Narrow, sewn-in tie belt at the waist, flap chest pockets with a button and long sleeves with buttoned cuffs. Unlined.

Sleeveless, V-neck blouse in woven fabric with a wrapover front, pleats at the shoulders, pleat at the back and narrow elastication at the hem. Concealed press-stud at the front and a practical inner top for easier nursing access.
Bra in microfibre and lace with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Adjustable shoulder straps, a lace racer back and metal front fastening.
Briefs in soft, organic cotton jersey with a mid waist, elastic waistband, lined gusset and medium coverage at the back.

Soft, non-wired, ribbed jersey bra tops with cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. No fasteners. The tops are designed with the minimum number of seams for a seamless, comfortable feel against the skin.
Long-sleeved top in soft jersey with a wide neckline, gently dropped shoulders and gathers in the sides for best fit.
5-pocket, ankle-length jeans in washed denim with a regular waist, button fly and slim, straight legs.
Baby Exclusive. Trousers in soft organic cotton slub jersey with an elasticated waist, fake fly with buttons, side pockets and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems.
Briefs in jersey made from a cotton blend with a wide elastic waistband. Mid waist, lined gusset and cutaway coverage at the back.

Soft non-wired triangle bra in lace with microfibre-lined cups that give the bust a natural shape and light support. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and wide elastic at the hem with a fastening at the back.

Baby Exclusive. Set with a long-sleeved top and pair of trousers in soft organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Top with a fastening at the top, a lined hood with a pompom, and sewn-in turn-ups at the cuffs. Trousers with an elasticated waist and sewn-in turn-ups at the hems. Soft brushed inside.
Padded sleep mask in satin with a patterned front, solid colour back and elastic strap at the back.
Cold shoulder top in a soft textured weave with flounces at the top, narrow shoulder straps and short sleeves with narrow elastication at the ends.
Top in sweatshirt fabric in a relaxed fit with dropped shoulders and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend.
Sleeveless bodysuits in soft organic cotton jersey with press-studs at the crotch.
Jumper in loose-knit tape yarn with a slightly wider neckline, dropped shoulders, long sleeves with sewn-in turn-ups and a rounded hem.Slightly longer at the back.
Long-sleeved jumper knitted in soft bouclé yarn with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.

Slim-fit, high-waisted, calf-length jeans in washed, superstretch, flexible denim for maximum mobility. Adjustable, elasticated waist (in sizes 8-12Y), zip fly and button, fake front pockets, real back pockets, and straight-cut hems with short slits in the sides.
Poncho in a soft knit containing some wool with open sides. Length at the front and back 80 cm.

Padded jacket in a coated weave with a detachable, pile-lined hood, stand-up collar and zip down the front with a chin guard. Handwarmer pockets, flap front pockets with a button, and ribbed cuffs. Partly lined in pile.
Sports bag in woven fabric with two handles and a drawstring at the top and one inner compartment. Lined. Depth 18 cm. Height 37 cm. Width 45 cm.
Round-necked T-shirt in soft cotton jersey.
T-shirt in cotton jersey with a print motif on the front.
Sleep mask in soft velour with glittery embroidery and appliqués and a satin backing. Narrow elastic strap at the back. Width 18 cm.
Pyjamas in soft, printed cotton jersey. Long-sleeved top with ribbing around the neckline and cuffs. Bottoms with an elasticated waist and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved dress and a pair of leggings in soft, printed cotton jersey. Dress with a flounce at the hem. Leggings with an elasticated waist.

Set with a cardigan, shirt and bow tie. Long-sleeved cardigan in soft, fine-knit cotton with a V-neck, buttons down the front and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Long-sleeved shirt in a cotton weave with a collar, buttons down the front and buttoned cuffs. Adjustable bow tie with a plastic fastener.
Short-sleeved, wrapover bodysuits in soft, organic cotton jersey with press-studs down one side and at the crotch.

Fully lined, super push-up bikini top with underwired, thickly padded cups to maximise the bust and create a fuller cleavage. Detachable, adjustable shoulder straps, a silicone trim at the hem and adjustable metal fastener at the back.
